definition: something of small importance, consider not very seriously
details:
noun
- something of small importance
= synonyms: triviality
- a detail that is considered insignificant
= synonyms: triviality
- a cold pudding made of layers of sponge cake spread with fruit or jelly
verb
- consider not very seriously
= synonyms: play
- act frivolously
= synonyms: frivol
- waste time
= synonyms: wanton
